contacts.description: Stores information about individual contacts within the CRM system, including personal details and relationship to companies.

company_id.description: Foreign key to the companies table

lead_source.description: Source from which the contact originated (e.g., web, referral, trade show)

created_date.description: Date and time when the contact was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the contact was last updated

companies.description: Stores information about companies, including their name, industry, and other relevant details.

zip_code.description: Zip code of the company's address

description.description: A description of the company

created_date.description: Date and time when the company was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the company was last updated

leads.description: Stores information about leads, potential customers who have shown interest in the product or service.

lead_source.description: Source from which the lead originated (e.g., web, referral, campaign)

lead_status.description: Current status of the lead (e.g., new, contacted, qualified, converted)

rating.description: Rating of the lead's potential (e.g., hot, warm, cold)

description.description: A description of the lead

assigned_to.description: User ID of the user assigned to the lead

created_date.description: Date and time when the lead was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the lead was last updated

opportunities.description: Stores information about sales opportunities, including details about the potential deal, associated contacts, and sales stage.

account_id.description: Foreign key to the accounts table, representing the account associated with the opportunity.

contact_id.description: Foreign key to the contacts table, representing the primary contact associated with the opportunity.

sales_stage.description: Current stage of the sales process (e.g., Prospecting, Qualification, Proposal, Negotiation, Closed Won, Closed Lost)

expected_close_date.description: The date the opportunity is expected to close.

amount.description: The expected value of the opportunity.

probability.description: The probability (as a percentage) of closing the opportunity.

description.description: A description of the opportunity

created_date.description: Date and time when the opportunity was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the opportunity was last updated

deals.description: Stores information about sales deals, including deal name, associated company, contact, stage, amount, and close date.

company_id.description: Foreign key to the companies table, representing the company associated with the deal

contact_id.description: Foreign key to the contacts table, representing the primary contact associated with the deal

stage.description: Current stage of the deal (e.g., Prospecting, Qualification, Proposal, Negotiation, Closed Won, Closed Lost)

close_date.description: Expected or actual close date of the deal

description.description: A description of the deal

created_date.description: Date and time when the deal was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the deal was last updated

tasks.description: Stores information about tasks, including their description, due date, status, and associated contacts or companies.

subject.description: Subject or title of the task

description.description: Detailed description of the task

due_date.description: Date and time when the task is due

status.description: Current status of the task (e.g., Open, In Progress, Completed, Deferred)

priority.description: Priority level of the task (e.g., High, Medium, Low)

contact_id.description: Foreign key to the contacts table, linking the task to a specific contact

company_id.description: Foreign key to the companies table, linking the task to a specific company

assigned_to.description: User ID of the user to whom the task is assigned

created_date.description: Date and time when the task was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the task was last updated

meetings.description: Stores information about scheduled meetings, including participants, agenda, and outcomes.

subject.description: Subject or title of the meeting

description.description: Detailed description or agenda of the meeting

start_time.description: Date and time when the meeting starts

end_time.description: Date and time when the meeting ends

location.description: Location where the meeting is held

organizer_id.description: Foreign key to the users table, indicating the meeting organizer

status.description: Status of the meeting (e.g., scheduled, completed, cancelled)

created_date.description: Date and time when the meeting was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the meeting was last updated

calls.description: Stores information about phone calls made to or from contacts within the CRM system. It tracks details such as call duration, outcome, and associated contacts or companies.

call_id.description: Unique identifier for each call record

contact_id.description: Foreign key to the contacts table, representing the contact involved in the call

company_id.description: Foreign key to the companies table, representing the company associated with the call

user_id.description: Foreign key to the users table, representing the user who made or received the call

call_duration.description: Duration of the call in seconds

call_outcome.description: Outcome of the call (e.g., completed, missed, busy)

call_notes.description: Notes or comments about the call

call_time.description: Date and time of the call

created_date.description: Date and time when the call record was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the call record was last updated

emails.description: Stores email content, status, and metadata for emails sent or received within the CRM system.

sent_date.description: Date and time when the email was sent

status.description: Status of the email (e.g., sent, delivered, opened, failed)

created_date.description: Date and time when the email record was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the email record was last updated

notes.description: Stores notes and comments associated with various CRM entities.

created_by.description: User ID of the user who created the note

created_date.description: Date and time when the note was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the note was last updated

users.description: Stores user account information for CRM system access and management.

role.description: User's role within the CRM system (e.g., admin, sales, support)

is_active.description: Flag indicating whether the user account is active

last_login.description: Date and time of the user's last login

created_date.description: Date and time when the user account was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the user account was last updated

pipelines.description: Stores information about sales pipelines, defining the stages and flow of the sales process.

description.description: A description of the pipeline and its purpose.

created_date.description: Date and time when the pipeline was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the pipeline was last updated

campaigns.description: Stores information about marketing campaigns, including their name, type, status, and associated costs.

campaign_type.description: Type of campaign (e.g., Email, Ad, Social Media)

status.description: Status of the campaign (e.g., Planned, In Progress, Completed, Cancelled)

actual_cost.description: Actual cost incurred by the campaign

description.description: Description of the campaign

created_date.description: Date and time when the campaign was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the campaign was last updated

activities.description: Stores information about activities performed within the CRM system, such as calls, meetings, emails, and tasks.

activity_type.description: Type of activity (e.g., Call, Meeting, Email, Task)

subject.description: Subject or title of the activity

description.description: Detailed description of the activity

start_date.description: Date and time when the activity is scheduled to start or started

end_date.description: Date and time when the activity is scheduled to end or ended

status.description: Status of the activity (e.g., Planned, In Progress, Completed, Cancelled)

priority.description: Priority of the activity (e.g., High, Medium, Low)

contact_id.description: Foreign key to the contacts table, linking the activity to a specific contact

company_id.description: Foreign key to the companies table, linking the activity to a specific company

user_id.description: Foreign key to the users table, indicating the user who performed the activity

created_date.description: Date and time when the activity was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the activity was last updated

products.description: Stores information about products offered within the CRM system.

description.description: Detailed description of the product

units.description: Units of measure for the product

created_date.description: Date and time when the product was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the product was last updated

quotes.description: Stores information about sales quotes generated within the CRM system.

opportunity_id.description: Foreign key to the opportunities table

quote_number.description: Unique quote number for identification purposes

quote_date.description: Date when the quote was generated

discount.description: Discount applied to the quote (percentage or amount)

tax_amount.description: Tax amount applied to the quote

shipping_cost.description: Shipping cost associated with the quote

status.description: Status of the quote (e.g., Draft, Sent, Accepted, Rejected)

terms_and_conditions.description: Terms and conditions applicable to the quote

notes.description: Additional notes or comments about the quote

created_date.description: Date and time when the quote was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the quote was last updated

invoices.description: Stores information about invoices generated within the CRM system, including billing details, amounts, and related entities.

customer_id.description: Foreign key to the customers table, indicating the customer associated with the invoice

invoice_date.description: Date when the invoice was issued

due_date.description: Date when the invoice is due for payment

total_amount.description: Total amount due on the invoice

amount_paid.description: Amount already paid towards the invoice

payment_date.description: Date when the invoice was paid

status.description: Status of the invoice (e.g., draft, sent, paid, overdue)

notes.description: Additional notes or comments about the invoice

created_date.description: Date and time when the invoice was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the invoice was last updated

orders.description: Stores information about customer orders, including order details, customer information, and order status.

customer_id.description: Foreign key to the customers table, representing the customer who placed the order

order_date.description: Date when the order was placed

status.description: Current status of the order (e.g., pending, processing, completed, cancelled)

payment_method.description: Payment method used for the order

shipping_method.description: Shipping method used for the order

tracking_number.description: Tracking number for the shipment (if applicable)

notes.description: Any additional notes or comments about the order

created_date.description: Date and time when the order was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the order was last updated

subscriptions.description: Stores information about subscriptions of contacts to different plans or services.

contact_id.description: Foreign key to the contacts table, identifying the contact subscribing

status.description: Status of the subscription (e.g., active, inactive, cancelled)

auto_renewal.description: Indicates whether the subscription is set to auto-renew (true/false)

payment_method.description: The payment method used for the subscription

subscription_amount.description: The amount charged for the subscription

created_date.description: Date and time when the subscription was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the subscription was last updated

cases.description: Stores information about customer support cases, including the subject, description, status, priority, and associated contact and company.

contact_id.description: Foreign key to the contacts table, representing the contact associated with the case

company_id.description: Foreign key to the companies table, representing the company associated with the case

description.description: Detailed description of the case

status.description: Current status of the case (e.g., Open, In Progress, Closed)

priority.description: Priority of the case (e.g., High, Medium, Low)

assigned_to.description: User ID of the user assigned to the case

created_date.description: Date and time when the case was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the case was last updated

events.description: Stores information about events, such as meetings, calls, or demos, associated with contacts or companies in the CRM system.

event_type.description: Type of event (e.g., meeting, call, demo)

subject.description: Subject or title of the event

description.description: Detailed description of the event

start_time.description: Date and time when the event starts

end_time.description: Date and time when the event ends

location.description: Location where the event takes place

contact_id.description: Foreign key to the contacts table, linking the event to a contact

company_id.description: Foreign key to the companies table, linking the event to a company

created_date.description: Date and time when the event was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the event was last updated

documents.description: Stores documents related to various entities within the CRM, such as contacts, companies, or deals.

file_size.description: Size of the document file in bytes

file_type.description: MIME type of the document file

description.description: A description of the document

contact_id.description: Foreign key to the contacts table, linking the document to a contact

company_id.description: Foreign key to the companies table, linking the document to a company

deal_id.description: Foreign key to the deals table, linking the document to a deal

created_date.description: Date and time when the document was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the document was last updated

tags.description: Stores a list of tags that can be associated with contacts and companies for categorization and filtering purposes.

description.description: A description of the tag

created_date.description: Date and time when the tag was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the tag was last updated

notifications.description: Stores notifications to be displayed to users, including details about the notification type, content, and status.

user_id.description: ID of the user to whom the notification is intended. Foreign key to the users table.

subject.description: Subject or title of the notification

is_read.description: Indicates whether the notification has been read by the user (0 = unread, 1 = read)

related_object_type.description: Type of object the notification is related to (e.g., 'task', 'opportunity', 'case')

related_object_id.description: ID of the object the notification is related to

created_date.description: Date and time when the notification was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the notification was last updated

integrations.description: Stores information about various integrations with third-party services and systems within the CRM.

description.description: A detailed description of the integration's purpose and functionality

api_key.description: API key required for the integration, if applicable

api_secret.description: API secret required for the integration, if applicable

oauth_token.description: OAuth token for the integration, if applicable

oauth_refresh_token.description: OAuth refresh token for the integration, if applicable

status.description: Status of the integration (e.g., 'active', 'inactive', 'pending')

settings.description: JSON blob to store integration-specific settings

created_date.description: Date and time when the integration was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the integration was last updated

webhooks.description: Stores information about webhooks configured within the CRM system, including the target URL, event type, and status.

target_url.description: The URL to which the webhook will send data

event_type.description: The event that triggers the webhook (e.g., 'contact_created', 'deal_updated')

secret.description: Secret key used to sign the webhook payload for security

is_active.description: Indicates whether the webhook is currently active (1) or inactive (0)

description.description: Optional description of the webhook's purpose

created_date.description: Date and time when the webhook was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the webhook was last updated

surveys.description: Stores information about surveys, including questions, response options, and survey results.

description.description: Description of the survey's purpose

status.description: Status of the survey (e.g., draft, active, closed)

created_date.description: Date and time when the survey was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the survey was last updated

discounts.description: Stores information about discounts available within the CRM system, including details like discount code, percentage, and validity period.

start_date.description: Date when the discount becomes valid

description.description: A description of the discount

created_date.description: Date and time when the discount was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the discount was last updated

refunds.description: Stores information about refunds issued to customers, including the reason, amount, and associated order.

order_id.description: Foreign key to the orders table, indicating the order to which the refund applies

customer_id.description: Foreign key to the customers table, indicating the customer who received the refund

refund_amount.description: The amount of the refund issued

refund_date.description: The date the refund was issued

refund_status.description: Status of the refund (e.g., pending, completed, rejected)

notes.description: Additional notes or comments about the refund

created_date.description: Date and time when the refund record was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the refund record was last updated

chargebacks.description: Stores information about chargebacks, including details about the disputed transaction, reason, and resolution.

transaction_id.description: Identifier for the transaction associated with the chargeback

customer_id.description: Identifier for the customer who initiated the chargeback

status.description: Current status of the chargeback (e.g., 'Open', 'Resolved', 'Denied')

resolution.description: Resolution details of the chargeback, if resolved

chargeback_date.description: Date when the chargeback was initiated

created_date.description: Date and time when the chargeback record was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the chargeback record was last updated

contact_addresses.description: Stores address information associated with contacts.

contact_address_id.description: Unique identifier for each contact address entry

contact_id.description: Foreign key to the contacts table

address_type.description: Type of address (e.g., Home, Work, Shipping, Billing)

is_primary.description: Indicates if this is the primary address for the contact (1 for true, 0 for false)

created_date.description: Date and time when the address was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the address was last updated

contact_tags.description: Associates contacts with specific tags, enabling categorization and filtering of contacts.

contact_tag_id.description: Unique identifier for each contact-tag association

contact_id.description: Foreign key referencing the contacts table

tag_id.description: Foreign key referencing the tags table

created_date.description: Date and time when the contact-tag association was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the contact-tag association was last updated

contact_notes.description: Stores notes and comments related to specific contacts in the CRM system.

contact_note_id.description: Unique identifier for each contact note

contact_id.description: Foreign key referencing the contact this note belongs to

note_id.description: Foreign key referencing the general notes table

note_text.description: The text content of the note

created_date.description: Date and time when the note was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the note was last updated

contact_preferences.description: Stores communication preferences for contacts, such as preferred communication channel, opt-in status, and notification settings.

preference_id.description: Unique identifier for each contact preference setting

contact_id.description: Foreign key to the contacts table, identifying the contact these preferences belong to

preferred_channel.description: Preferred communication channel for the contact (e.g., email, phone, SMS)

email_opt_in.description: Indicates whether the contact has opted in to receive emails

sms_opt_in.description: Indicates whether the contact has opted in to receive SMS messages

phone_opt_in.description: Indicates whether the contact has opted in to receive phone calls

notification_frequency.description: Frequency of notifications for the contact (e.g., daily, weekly, monthly)

do_not_call.description: Indicates whether the contact is on the do-not-call list

do_not_email.description: Indicates whether the contact is on the do-not-email list

created_date.description: Date and time when the preference was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the preference was last updated

contact_relationships.description: Stores information about relationships between contacts, such as family members, colleagues, or referrals.

contact_id_1.description: Foreign key to the contacts table, representing the first contact in the relationship

contact_id_2.description: Foreign key to the contacts table, representing the second contact in the relationship

relationship_type.description: Type of relationship between the two contacts (e.g., 'family', 'colleague', 'friend', 'referral')

description.description: Optional description of the relationship

end_date.description: Date when the relationship ended (if applicable)

created_date.description: Date and time when the relationship was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the relationship was last updated

contact_emails.description: Junction table linking contacts and emails, allowing a many-to-many relationship between them. Stores the association between contacts and their email addresses.

contact_email_id.description: Unique identifier for each contact-email relationship

contact_id.description: Foreign key referencing the contact table

email_id.description: Foreign key referencing the emails table

is_primary.description: Indicates if this email is the primary email for the contact (1 for true, 0 for false)

created_date.description: Date and time when the association was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the association was last updated

company_addresses.description: Stores address information for companies, allowing for multiple addresses per company.

company_address_id.description: Unique identifier for each company address entry.

company_id.description: Foreign key referencing the companies table.

is_primary.description: Flag indicating if this is the primary address for the company.  Only one address should be primary.

created_date.description: Date and time when the address entry was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the address entry was last updated.

company_tags.description: Associates companies with specific tags for categorization and filtering purposes.

company_tag_id.description: Unique identifier for each company-tag association.

company_id.description: Foreign key referencing the companies table.

tag_id.description: Foreign key referencing the tags table.

created_date.description: Date and time when the association was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the association was last updated.

company_notes.description: Stores notes and comments related to companies.

company_note_id.description: Unique identifier for each company note

company_id.description: Foreign key to the companies table

note_id.description: Foreign key to the notes table

created_date.description: Date and time when the note was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the note was last updated

company_contacts.description: Junction table establishing a many-to-many relationship between companies and contacts.

company_id.description: Foreign key referencing the company table.

contact_id.description: Foreign key referencing the contacts table.

relationship_type.description: Describes the nature of the relationship between the company and the contact (e.g., employee, customer, vendor).

is_primary_contact.description: Indicates whether this contact is the primary contact for the company. Allows only one primary contact per company.

created_date.description: Date and time when the relationship was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the relationship was last updated.

lead_sources.description: Stores information about the origin of leads, specifying where they came from (e.g., website, referral, advertisement).

lead_source_id.description: Unique identifier for each lead source

source_name.description: Name of the lead source (e.g., 'Website Form', 'Referral Program', 'Google Ads')

source_description.description: A more detailed description of the lead source.

is_active.description: Indicates whether the lead source is currently active and being used.

created_date.description: Date and time when the lead source was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the lead source was last updated

lead_statuses.description: Stores the different possible statuses for leads within the CRM system. Examples include 'New', 'Contacted', 'Qualified', 'Lost', 'Converted'.

lead_status_id.description: Unique identifier for each lead status

status_description.description: A description of what this status means.

is_active.description: Indicates if this status is currently active and available for use.

created_date.description: Date and time when the lead status was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the lead status was last updated

lead_scores.description: Junction table linking leads to scores, enabling a many-to-many relationship between leads and scores. This allows tracking multiple scores for each lead.

lead_score_id.description: Unique identifier for each lead-score association.

lead_id.description: Foreign key referencing the lead table.

score_id.description: Foreign key referencing the scores table.

score_value.description: The actual score value for the lead.

created_date.description: Date and time when the lead-score association was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the lead-score association was last updated.

lead_conversions.description: Junction table linking leads to conversions, recording when a lead converts and any relevant details about the conversion event.

lead_conversion_id.description: Unique identifier for each lead conversion record

lead_id.description: Foreign key referencing the leads table

conversion_id.description: Foreign key referencing the conversions table

conversion_date.description: Date and time when the lead converted

conversion_value.description: Monetary value associated with the conversion (e.g., deal size)

notes.description: Any notes or details about the conversion event

created_date.description: Date and time when the lead conversion record was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the lead conversion record was last updated

lead_assignments.description: Tracks the assignment of leads to specific users within the CRM system. This table facilitates lead distribution and accountability.

lead_assignment_id.description: Unique identifier for each lead assignment record.

lead_id.description: Foreign key referencing the leads table, indicating the lead being assigned.

assigned_user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table, indicating the user to whom the lead is assigned.

assignment_date.description: Date and time when the lead was assigned to the user.

status.description: Current status of the lead assignment (e.g., 'Active', 'Completed', 'Reassigned').

notes.description: Any relevant notes or comments regarding the lead assignment.

created_date.description: Date and time when the lead assignment record was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the lead assignment record was last updated.

opportunity_sources.description: Stores the origin or source of a sales opportunity, indicating where the opportunity was generated from.

opportunity_source_id.description: Unique identifier for each opportunity source

source_name.description: Name of the opportunity source (e.g., 'Website', 'Referral', 'Trade Show')

description.description: A more detailed description of the opportunity source.

is_active.description: Flag indicating whether the opportunity source is currently active and available for selection.

created_date.description: Date and time when the opportunity source was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the opportunity source was last updated

opportunity_stages.description: Defines the different stages an opportunity can progress through in the sales pipeline.

opportunity_stage_id.description: Unique identifier for each opportunity stage

stage_name.description: Name of the opportunity stage (e.g., Qualification, Proposal, Negotiation, Closed Won, Closed Lost)

stage_order.description: Numerical order of the stage in the sales pipeline.  Lower numbers indicate earlier stages.

probability.description: Probability of winning the opportunity at this stage (as a percentage, e.g., 50 for 50%)

deal_stage_id.description: Foreign key referencing the deal_stages table, linking this opportunity stage to a deal stage.

pipeline_stage_id.description: Foreign key referencing the pipeline_stages table, linking this opportunity stage to a pipeline stage.

description.description: A description of the opportunity stage

created_date.description: Date and time when the opportunity stage was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the opportunity stage was last updated

opportunity_statuses.description: Stores the different statuses an opportunity can have (e.g., Open, Qualified, Closed Won, Closed Lost).

opportunity_status_id.description: Unique identifier for each opportunity status

status_name.description: Name of the opportunity status (e.g., 'Qualified Lead', 'Proposal Sent')

status_description.description: A brief description of the opportunity status.

is_active.description: Indicates whether the status is currently active and available for selection.

created_date.description: Date and time when the opportunity status was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the opportunity status was last updated

opportunity_notes.description: Stores notes and comments related to specific sales opportunities within the CRM system.

opportunity_note_id.description: Unique identifier for each opportunity note

opportunity_id.description: Foreign key referencing the opportunities table

note_id.description: Foreign key referencing the notes table

created_date.description: Date and time when the opportunity note was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the opportunity note was last updated

deal_stages.description: Represents the different stages a deal can go through in a sales pipeline.

deal_stage_id.description: Unique identifier for each deal stage.

pipeline_id.description: Foreign key to the deal_pipelines table, indicating which pipeline this stage belongs to.

stage_order.description: Numerical order of the stage within the pipeline.  Lower numbers represent earlier stages.

stage_probability.description: Probability of a deal closing successfully at this stage (as a percentage).

is_active.description: Indicates whether the stage is currently active and available for use.

description.description: A description of the deal stage.

created_date.description: Date and time when the deal stage was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the deal stage was last updated.

deal_pipelines.description: Junction table linking deals to pipelines, allowing a deal to be associated with multiple pipelines or a pipeline to contain multiple deals. Represents the deal's progression through different sales pipelines.

deal_pipeline_id.description: Unique identifier for each deal-pipeline association

deal_id.description: Foreign key to the deals table

pipeline_id.description: Foreign key to the pipelines table

created_date.description: Date and time when the deal was added to the pipeline

updated_date.description: Date and time when the deal's pipeline association was last updated

deal_sources.description: Stores information about the sources from which sales deals originate.

deal_source_id.description: Unique identifier for each deal source

source_description.description: A more detailed description of the deal source

lead_source_id.description: Foreign key to the lead_sources table, if applicable

opportunity_source_id.description: Foreign key to the opportunity_sources table, if applicable

created_date.description: Date and time when the deal source was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the deal source was last updated

deal_notes.description: Stores notes and comments related to specific deals in the CRM system. This table acts as a junction table between deals and notes.

deal_note_id.description: Unique identifier for each deal note entry

deal_id.description: Foreign key referencing the deals table.

note_id.description: Foreign key referencing the notes table.

created_date.description: Date and time when the deal note was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the deal note was last updated

task_types.description: Defines the different types of tasks that can be assigned within the CRM system. Examples include 'Call', 'Email', 'Meeting', etc.

task_type_id.description: Unique identifier for each task type

description.description: A more detailed description of the task type

is_active.description: Indicates whether the task type is currently active and available for use

created_date.description: Date and time when the task type was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the task type was last updated

task_statuses.description: Stores the different statuses that a task can have, such as 'Open', 'In Progress', 'Completed', or 'Cancelled'.

task_status_id.description: Unique identifier for each task status

status_name.description: Name of the task status (e.g., 'Open', 'In Progress')

description.description: A more detailed description of the task status

is_default.description: Flag indicating if this is the default status for new tasks (1 for yes, 0 for no)

created_date.description: Date and time when the task status was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the task status was last updated

task_assignments.description: Represents assignments of tasks to users, tracking task details, status, and associated entities.

task_assignment_id.description: Unique identifier for each task assignment

task_type_id.description: Foreign key referencing the task_types table, indicating the type of task.

assigned_to_user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table, indicating the user to whom the task is assigned.

task_status_id.description: Foreign key referencing the task_statuses table, indicating the current status of the task.

subject.description: Subject or title of the task.

description.description: Detailed description of the task.

due_date.description: Date and time when the task is due.

priority.description: Priority level of the task (e.g., High, Medium, Low).

related_entity_type.description: The type of entity this task is related to (e.g., 'lead', 'contact', 'account').

related_entity_id.description: The ID of the entity this task is related to (e.g., lead_id, contact_id, account_id).

is_completed.description: Flag indicating whether the task is completed (1 for true, 0 for false).

created_date.description: Date and time when the task assignment was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the task assignment was last updated.

task_comments.description: Junction table linking tasks and comments, allowing multiple comments per task.

task_comment_id.description: Unique identifier for each task comment entry

task_id.description: Foreign key referencing the task table

comment_id.description: Foreign key referencing the comments table

created_date.description: Date and time when the task comment entry was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the task comment entry was last updated

meeting_attendees.description: Junction table linking meetings and attendees, allowing for a many-to-many relationship.

meeting_attendee_id.description: Unique identifier for each meeting attendee record.

meeting_id.description: Foreign key referencing the meeting table.

attendee_id.description: Foreign key referencing the contacts table.

attendance_status.description: Indicates the attendance status of the attendee (e.g., 'Attended', 'Invited', 'Declined').

created_date.description: Date and time when the meeting attendee record was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the meeting attendee record was last updated.

meeting_notes.description: Stores notes and comments associated with scheduled meetings, linking to the main notes table and potentially other CRM entities.

meeting_note_id.description: Unique identifier for each meeting note entry

meeting_id.description: Foreign key to the meetings table

note_id.description: Foreign key to the notes table, containing the actual note content

created_date.description: Date and time when the meeting note entry was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the meeting note entry was last updated

meeting_types.description: Stores the different types or categories of meetings that can be scheduled in the CRM system.

meeting_type_id.description: Unique identifier for each meeting type.

meeting_type_name.description: Name of the meeting type (e.g., 'Sales Call', 'Project Update', 'Training').

description.description: A more detailed description of the meeting type.

is_active.description: Indicates whether the meeting type is currently active and available for use.

created_date.description: Date and time when the meeting type was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the meeting type was last updated.

call_logs.description: Stores information about phone calls, including call details, participants, and outcomes.

call_log_id.description: Unique identifier for each call log entry

caller_id.description: Identifier of the caller (e.g., user ID or contact ID)

recipient.description: Phone number or identifier of the call recipient

call_start_time.description: Date and time when the call started

call_end_time.description: Date and time when the call ended

duration_seconds.description: Duration of the call in seconds

call_outcome_id.description: Foreign key to the call_outcomes table, indicating the result of the call

call_recording_id.description: Foreign key to the call_recordings table, if the call was recorded

notes.description: Any notes or comments about the call

created_date.description: Date and time when the call log was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the call log was last updated

call_recordings.description: Junction table linking calls and recordings, enabling a many-to-many relationship between them. It stores the association between specific calls and their corresponding recording files.

call_recording_id.description: Unique identifier for each call recording association.

call_id.description: Foreign key referencing the calls table, indicating the specific call associated with the recording.

recording_id.description: Foreign key referencing the recordings table, indicating the specific recording file associated with the call.

created_date.description: Date and time when the call recording association was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the call recording association was last updated.

call_outcomes.description: Junction table linking calls and outcomes, representing the outcomes of specific calls.

call_outcome_id.description: Unique identifier for each call outcome record

call_id.description: Foreign key referencing the calls table

outcome_id.description: Foreign key referencing the outcomes table

outcome_details.description: Additional details or notes about the specific outcome of the call

created_date.description: Date and time when the call outcome record was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the call outcome record was last updated

email_templates.description: Junction table linking emails and templates, enabling many-to-many relationships between them. An email can use multiple templates and a template can be used in multiple emails.

email_template_id.description: Unique identifier for the email-template relationship

email_id.description: Foreign key referencing the email table

template_id.description: Foreign key referencing the templates table

created_date.description: Date and time when the email-template association was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the email-template association was last updated

email_campaigns.description: Junction table linking emails and campaigns, enabling many-to-many relationship between them. Stores information about which emails were sent as part of which campaigns.

email_campaign_id.description: Unique identifier for each email-campaign association

email_id.description: Foreign key referencing the email table

campaign_id.description: Foreign key referencing the campaigns table

send_date.description: Date and time when the email was sent as part of the campaign

status.description: Status of the email within the campaign (e.g., 'sent', 'pending', 'failed')

created_date.description: Date and time when the entry was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the entry was last updated

email_attachments.description: Stores information about attachments associated with emails, linking them to specific email logs.

attachment_id.description: Unique identifier for each email attachment.

email_log_id.description: Foreign key to the email_logs table, identifying the email to which the attachment belongs.

file_name.description: The original name of the attached file.

file_path.description: The path to the stored attachment file on the server or cloud storage.

file_size.description: The size of the attachment file in bytes.

file_type.description: The MIME type of the attachment file (e.g., 'application/pdf', 'image/jpeg').

created_date.description: Date and time when the attachment record was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the attachment record was last updated.

email_logs.description: Stores logs of all email activities, including sent emails, delivery status, opens, clicks, and bounces.

email_log_id.description: Unique identifier for each email log entry

email_campaign_id.description: Foreign key to the email_campaigns table, indicating the campaign this email belongs to.

email_template_id.description: Foreign key to the email_templates table, indicating the template used for this email.

status.description: Status of the email (e.g., sent, delivered, opened, bounced, failed).

send_date.description: Date and time when the email was sent.

open_date.description: Date and time when the email was opened by the recipient.

click_date.description: Date and time when a link in the email was clicked by the recipient.

bounce_type.description: Type of bounce (e.g., hard bounce, soft bounce).

error_message.description: Error message if the email failed to send.

user_login_log_id.description: Foreign key to user_login_logs table, tracking the user login session associated with the email sending.

audit_log_id.description: Foreign key to audit_logs table, tracking changes related to this email log.

integration_log_id.description: Foreign key to integration_logs table, if the email sending was part of an integration.

email_blacklist_id.description: Foreign key to email_blacklist table, indicating if the recipient is blacklisted.

created_date.description: Date and time when the email log entry was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the email log entry was last updated.

user_roles.description: Junction table linking users and roles, defining which roles a user has.

user_role_id.description: Unique identifier for each user-role assignment.

user_id.description: Foreign key to the users table, indicating the user associated with this role.

role_id.description: Foreign key to the roles table, indicating the role assigned to the user.

created_date.description: Date and time when the user-role assignment was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the user-role assignment was last updated.

user_permissions.description: Junction table linking users and permissions, defining which permissions are granted to which users.

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table.

permission_id.description: Foreign key referencing the permissions table.

created_date.description: Date and time when the permission was granted to the user.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the permission assignment was last updated.

user_settings.description: Stores user-specific settings and preferences for the CRM system.

setting_id.description: Unique identifier for each user setting

user_id.description: Foreign key to the users table, identifying the user who owns this setting

created_date.description: Date and time when the setting was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the setting was last updated

pipeline_stages.description: Defines the different stages in a sales or opportunity pipeline, tracking progress and likelihood of conversion.

pipeline_stage_id.description: Unique identifier for each pipeline stage

stage_name.description: Name of the pipeline stage (e.g., 'Lead', 'Qualified', 'Proposal', 'Negotiation', 'Closed Won', 'Closed Lost')

stage_order.description: Numerical order of the stage within the pipeline (determines sequence)

probability.description: Probability (as a percentage) of closing the deal at this stage (e.g., 0-100)

is_active.description: Indicates whether the stage is currently active and available for use

description.description: Optional description of the stage and its purpose

created_date.description: Date and time when the pipeline stage was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the pipeline stage was last updated

campaign_types.description: Stores the different types of marketing campaigns that can be run within the CRM system. Examples: Email Marketing, Social Media, Paid Advertising.

campaign_type_id.description: Unique identifier for each campaign type.

campaign_type_name.description: Name of the campaign type (e.g., 'Email Campaign', 'Webinar').

description.description: A more detailed description of the campaign type.

created_date.description: Date and time when the campaign type was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the campaign type was last updated.

campaign_statuses.description: Stores the different possible statuses for marketing campaigns.

campaign_status_id.description: Unique identifier for each campaign status

status_name.description: Name of the campaign status (e.g., 'Planned', 'In Progress', 'Completed', 'Cancelled')

description.description: A more detailed description of the campaign status.

is_active.description: Indicates whether the status is currently active and available for use.

created_date.description: Date and time when the campaign status was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the campaign status was last updated

campaign_performance.description: Stores performance metrics for marketing campaigns, tracking key indicators such as impressions, clicks, conversions, and cost.

campaign_performance_id.description: Unique identifier for each campaign performance record

campaign_id.description: Foreign key to the campaigns table

campaign_type_id.description: Foreign key to the campaign_types table

campaign_status_id.description: Foreign key to the campaign_statuses table

ad_performance_id.description: Foreign key to the ad_performance table

impressions.description: Number of times the campaign's ads were displayed

clicks.description: Number of times the campaign's ads were clicked

conversions.description: Number of conversions resulting from the campaign

revenue.description: Total revenue generated by the campaign

created_date.description: Date and time when the performance record was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the performance record was last updated

activity_types.description: Defines the different types of activities that can be performed within the CRM system, such as tasks, meetings, calls, and emails.

activity_type_id.description: Unique identifier for each activity type.

description.description: A more detailed description of the activity type.

is_enabled.description: Indicates whether the activity type is currently enabled for use.

created_date.description: Date and time when the activity type was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the activity type was last updated.

product_categories.description: Junction table to manage the many-to-many relationship between products and categories.

product_id.description: Foreign key referencing the product table.

category_id.description: Foreign key referencing the categories table.

created_date.description: Date and time when the product-category association was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the product-category association was last updated.

product_prices.description: Junction table linking products and their prices, allowing for multiple prices per product (e.g., different currencies, discounts, or price tiers).

product_price_id.description: Unique identifier for each product price entry

product_id.description: Foreign key referencing the product table

price_id.description: Foreign key referencing the prices table

price.description: The actual price of the product.  Consider using DECIMAL for currency.

currency.description: Currency code for the price (e.g., USD, EUR)

start_date.description: Date when this price becomes effective

end_date.description: Date when this price expires.  NULL indicates no expiration.

discount_percentage.description: Discount percentage applied to the price, if any.

notes.description: Any additional notes or details about this specific price.

created_date.description: Date and time when the product price entry was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the product price entry was last updated

product_inventory.description: Junction table linking products and inventory, tracking the quantity of each product in specific inventory locations.

product_inventory_id.description: Unique identifier for each product inventory record.

product_id.description: Foreign key referencing the product table.

inventory_id.description: Foreign key referencing the inventory table (assuming an inventory table exists elsewhere).

quantity.description: Quantity of the product in the specified inventory location.

location.description: Specific location within the inventory (e.g., warehouse section, shelf number).

created_date.description: Date and time when the product inventory record was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the product inventory record was last updated.

quote_items.description: Junction table linking quotes and items, representing the items included in a specific quote.

quote_item_id.description: Unique identifier for each quote item entry

quote_id.description: Foreign key referencing the quote table

item_id.description: Foreign key referencing the items table

quantity.description: Quantity of the item included in the quote

unit_price.description: The price of a single unit of the item at the time of the quote.

discount.description: Discount applied to the item in the quote (percentage or fixed amount).

description.description: Optional description or notes for this specific item within the quote.

created_date.description: Date and time when the quote item was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the quote item was last updated

quote_statuses.description: Stores the different statuses that a quote can have, such as 'Draft', 'Sent', 'Accepted', 'Rejected', etc.

quote_status_id.description: Unique identifier for each quote status

status_description.description: A more detailed description of the quote status

is_active.description: Indicates whether the status is currently active and available for use

created_date.description: Date and time when the quote status was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the quote status was last updated

invoice_items.description: Junction table linking invoices and items, storing details about each item included in an invoice.

invoice_item_id.description: Unique identifier for each invoice item record

invoice_id.description: Foreign key to the invoices table

item_id.description: Foreign key to the items table (or product table, depending on your schema)

quantity.description: Quantity of the item included in the invoice

unit_price.description: The price of a single unit of the item at the time of invoicing.

discount.description: Discount applied to the item on the invoice (percentage or fixed amount).

description.description: Optional description or notes related to the item on this specific invoice.

created_date.description: Date and time when the invoice item was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the invoice item was last updated

invoice_statuses.description: Stores the different possible statuses for invoices in the CRM system.

invoice_status_id.description: Unique identifier for each invoice status.

status_description.description: A brief description of what the invoice status represents.

created_date.description: Date and time when the invoice status was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the invoice status was last updated.

order_items.description: Junction table linking orders and items, representing individual items within an order. Stores quantity and price information for each item in the order.

order_item_id.description: Unique identifier for each order item

order_id.description: Foreign key to the orders table

item_id.description: Foreign key to the items table

quantity.description: Quantity of the item in the order

price.description: Price of the item at the time of the order

discount.description: Discount applied to the item in the order

created_date.description: Date and time when the order item was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the order item was last updated

order_statuses.description: Stores the different possible statuses for customer orders within the CRM system.

order_status_id.description: Unique identifier for each order status

description.description: A more detailed description of the order status.

is_active.description: Indicates whether the status is currently active and available for assignment.

created_date.description: Date and time when the order status was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the order status was last updated

subscription_plans.description: Junction table linking subscriptions and plans, enabling many-to-many relationship between them. Stores the association between a specific subscription and the plan it utilizes.

subscription_plan_id.description: Unique identifier for each subscription-plan association.

subscription_id.description: Foreign key referencing the subscriptions table.

plan_id.description: Foreign key referencing the plans table.

start_date.description: The date when the subscription started using this plan.

end_date.description: The date when the subscription stopped using this plan. Can be NULL if the subscription is currently using this plan.

price.description: The price paid for this plan during the subscription period. Useful for historical pricing.

created_date.description: Date and time when the subscription-plan association was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the subscription-plan association was last updated.

subscription_statuses.description: Stores the possible status values for subscriptions, such as 'Active', 'Cancelled', 'Trial', etc.

subscription_status_id.description: Unique identifier for each subscription status

status_name.description: Name of the subscription status (e.g., Active, Cancelled)

description.description: A more detailed description of the status

is_active.description: Indicates if the status is currently considered active

created_date.description: Date and time when the status was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the status was last updated

subscription_payments.description: Junction table linking subscriptions and payments, tracking which payments apply to which subscriptions.

subscription_payment_id.description: Unique identifier for each subscription payment record.

subscription_id.description: Foreign key to the subscriptions table, indicating the subscription this payment applies to.

payment_id.description: Foreign key to the payments table, indicating the payment applied to the subscription.

payment_amount.description: The amount of the payment applied to this subscription.  This may be less than the total payment amount if a single payment covers multiple subscriptions.

created_date.description: Date and time when the subscription payment record was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the subscription payment record was last updated.

support_tickets.description: Junction table linking support agents and tickets, representing the assignment of support agents to specific tickets.

support_ticket_id.description: Unique identifier for each support ticket assignment

support_id.description: Foreign key referencing the support table, indicating the support agent assigned to the ticket.

ticket_id.description: Foreign key referencing the tickets table, indicating the ticket being assigned to the support agent.

assigned_date.description: Date and time when the support agent was assigned to the ticket.

created_date.description: Date and time when the support_tickets record was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the support_tickets record was last updated

ticket_statuses.description: Stores the different possible statuses for support tickets within the CRM system.

ticket_status_id.description: Unique identifier for each ticket status

status_name.description: Name of the ticket status (e.g., Open, In Progress, Resolved, Closed)

description.description: A more detailed description of the status.

is_default.description: Flag indicating if this is the default status for new tickets (1 for yes, 0 for no)

sort_order.description: Integer determining the order in which statuses are displayed in lists.

created_date.description: Date and time when the ticket status was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the ticket status was last updated

ticket_priorities.description: Junction table linking tickets and priorities, allowing a ticket to have multiple priorities and a priority to be associated with multiple tickets.

ticket_id.description: Foreign key referencing the ticket table

priority_id.description: Foreign key referencing the priorities table

created_date.description: Date and time when the association was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the association was last updated

ticket_assignments.description: Tracks the assignment of tickets to specific users.

ticket_assignment_id.description: Unique identifier for each ticket assignment record.

ticket_id.description: Foreign key referencing the tickets table.

assigned_user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table, indicating the user assigned to the ticket.

assignment_date.description: Date and time when the ticket was assigned to the user.

created_date.description: Date and time when the assignment record was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the assignment record was last updated.

ticket_notes.description: Stores notes and comments associated with support tickets.

ticket_note_id.description: Unique identifier for each ticket note

ticket_id.description: Foreign key to the tickets table

note_id.description: Foreign key to the notes table

created_date.description: Date and time when the ticket note was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the ticket note was last updated

case_statuses.description: Defines the possible statuses for cases within the CRM system.

case_status_id.description: Unique identifier for each case status

status_name.description: Name of the case status (e.g., 'Open', 'In Progress', 'Resolved', 'Closed')

description.description: A more detailed description of the case status.

is_default.description: Indicates if this is the default status for new cases. Only one status should be the default.

sort_order.description: Defines the order in which the statuses are displayed. Lower values appear first.

created_date.description: Date and time when the case status was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the case status was last updated

case_types.description: Defines the different types or categories of cases that can be created within the CRM system.

case_type_id.description: Unique identifier for each case type

case_type_name.description: Name of the case type (e.g., 'Technical Support', 'Sales Inquiry')

description.description: A more detailed description of the case type

is_active.description: Indicates whether the case type is currently active and available for use

created_date.description: Date and time when the case type was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the case type was last updated

case_resolutions.description: Junction table linking cases and resolutions, enabling many-to-many relationships between them. Stores the association between a case and the resolutions applied to it.

case_resolution_id.description: Unique identifier for each case resolution entry.

case_id.description: Foreign key referencing the case table. Represents the case to which the resolution is applied.

resolution_id.description: Foreign key referencing the resolutions table. Represents the specific resolution applied to the case.

resolution_notes.description: Additional notes or details regarding the application of the resolution to the case.

created_date.description: Date and time when the case resolution entry was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the case resolution entry was last updated.

case_assignments.description: Tracks the assignment of cases to specific users, including the assignment date and any relevant notes.

case_assignment_id.description: Unique identifier for each case assignment record

case_id.description: Foreign key to the cases table, identifying the case being assigned

assigned_user_id.description: Foreign key to the users table, identifying the user to whom the case is assigned

assignment_date.description: Date and time when the case was assigned to the user

notes.description: Any notes or comments related to the case assignment

created_date.description: Date and time when the case assignment record was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the case assignment record was last updated

event_attendees.description: Junction table to manage the many-to-many relationship between events and attendees (contacts).

event_attendee_id.description: Unique identifier for each event attendee record.

event_id.description: Foreign key referencing the events table.

contact_id.description: Foreign key referencing the contacts table.

created_date.description: Date and time when the attendee was added to the event.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the attendee's information was last updated.

event_types.description: Defines the different types of events that can be scheduled or recorded in the CRM system. Examples include meetings, calls, webinars, etc.

event_type_id.description: Unique identifier for each event type

description.description: A more detailed description of the event type

is_active.description: Indicates whether the event type is currently active and available for use

created_date.description: Date and time when the event type was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the event type was last updated

event_notes.description: Stores notes and comments related to specific events, providing additional context and information about each event.

event_note_id.description: Unique identifier for each event note.

event_id.description: Foreign key referencing the event to which this note belongs.

note_id.description: Foreign key referencing the generic notes table.

attendee_id.description: Foreign key referencing the event attendees table, indicating who added the note.

note_text.description: The actual text content of the event note.

created_date.description: Date and time when the event note was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the event note was last updated.

document_categories.description: Junction table linking documents and categories, enabling many-to-many relationships between them.

document_category_id.description: Unique identifier for each document-category relationship

document_id.description: Foreign key referencing the documents table

category_id.description: Foreign key referencing the categories table

created_date.description: Date and time when the relationship was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the relationship was last updated

document_permissions.description: Junction table linking documents and permissions, enabling fine-grained access control for documents.

document_permission_id.description: Unique identifier for each document permission entry

document_id.description: Foreign key referencing the document table

permission_id.description: Foreign key referencing the user_permissions table

created_date.description: Date and time when the document permission was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the document permission was last updated

document_versions.description: Junction table linking documents to their versions, enabling version control and history tracking.

document_version_id.description: Unique identifier for each document version entry

document_id.description: Foreign key referencing the document table

version_id.description: Foreign key referencing the crm_versions table

created_date.description: Date and time when the document version entry was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the document version entry was last updated

notification_preferences.description: Stores notification preferences for various entities within the CRM system. This table allows users or system components to configure how and when they receive notifications.

notification_preference_id.description: Unique identifier for each notification preference setting

entity_type.description: The type of entity (e.g., 'contact', 'opportunity', 'case') to which the notification preference applies.

entity_id.description: The ID of the specific entity to which the notification preference applies.

event_type.description: The event that triggers the notification (e.g., 'created', 'updated', 'deleted').

is_enabled.description: Indicates whether the notification is enabled (1) or disabled (0).

delivery_method.description: Specifies the method of delivery for the notification (e.g., 'email', 'sms', 'in-app').

created_date.description: Date and time when the notification preference was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the notification preference was last updated

audit_logs.description: Stores audit logs for tracking changes and activities within the CRM system. It captures information about who made the change, when it was made, what was changed, and on which record the change was made.

audit_log_id.description: Unique identifier for each audit log entry

log_time.description: Timestamp of when the audit log event occurred

user_id.description: Foreign key to the users table, indicating which user performed the action

event_type.description: Type of event that was logged (e.g., 'CREATE', 'UPDATE', 'DELETE', 'LOGIN', 'LOGOUT')

object_type.description: The type of object that was affected by the event (e.g., 'contact', 'company', 'opportunity')

object_id.description: The ID of the object that was affected by the event (e.g., contact_id, company_id, opportunity_id)

description.description: Detailed description of the event that occurred

ip_address.description: IP address of the user who performed the action

session_id.description: Session ID of the user's session when the action was performed

old_value.description: The old value of the field that was changed (if applicable). JSON format.

new_value.description: The new value of the field that was changed (if applicable). JSON format.

created_date.description: Date and time when the audit log entry was created

system_settings.description: Stores global configuration settings for the CRM system.

setting_id.description: Unique identifier for each system setting

setting_value.description: Value of the setting. Can be a string, number, or serialized data.

is_active.description: Indicates whether the setting is currently active

created_date.description: Date and time when the setting was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the setting was last updated

integration_logs.description: Stores logs of integration activities with external systems, including details about the integration process, status, and any errors encountered.

log_id.description: Unique identifier for each integration log entry

integration_name.description: Name of the specific integration (e.g., 'Mailchimp', 'Twilio', 'Facebook Ads')

entity_type.description: The type of entity being integrated (e.g., 'contact', 'company', 'deal')

entity_id.description: The ID of the entity being integrated

status.description: Status of the integration process (e.g., 'success', 'pending', 'failed')

start_time.description: Timestamp when the integration process started

end_time.description: Timestamp when the integration process ended

details.description: Detailed information about the integration process, stored as JSON

error_message.description: Error message if the integration failed

survey_responses.description: Junction table linking surveys and individual responses, recording each response to a survey question.

customer_feedback.description: Stores customer feedback data, including the feedback text, rating, associated customer, and related entities.

resolution_status.description: Indicates whether the feedback has been resolved or not (e.g., 'Open', 'In Progress', 'Resolved')

updated_date.description: Date and time when the feedback entry was last updated

customer_reviews.description: Junction table linking customers to reviews, allowing for many-to-many relationships between customers and the reviews they submit.
