created_date.description: Date and time when the association was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the association was last updated

team_collaboration.description: Junction table linking teams and collaborations, enabling many-to-many relationships between them. Records when a team participated in a specific collaboration activity.

team_collaboration_id.description: Unique identifier for each team collaboration entry.

team_id.description: Foreign key referencing the team table. Indicates the team involved in the collaboration.

collaboration_id.description: Foreign key referencing the collaboration table. Indicates the specific collaboration activity.

participation_date.description: Date when the team participated in the collaboration activity.

notes.description: Any notes or observations regarding the team's participation in the collaboration.

created_date.description: Date and time when the team collaboration entry was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the team collaboration entry was last updated.

internal_messages.description: Junction table linking internal users and messages, allowing for many-to-many relationships between users and messages.

internal_message_id.description: Unique identifier for each internal message record

internal_id.description: Foreign key referencing the internal user involved in the message

message_id.description: Foreign key referencing the message being linked to the internal user

created_date.description: Date and time when the internal message record was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the internal message record was last updated

goal_tracking.description: Junction table linking goals and tracking entries, enabling tracking of progress towards specific goals.

goal_tracking_id.description: Unique identifier for each goal tracking entry

goal_id.description: Foreign key to the goals table

tracking_id.description: Foreign key to the tracking table (e.g., device_tracking)

tracking_date.description: Date when the tracking event occurred.

progress_value.description: The value of the progress made towards the goal at the time of tracking.

notes.description: Any notes associated with the tracking entry for the goal.

created_date.description: Date and time when the goal tracking entry was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the goal tracking entry was last updated

okr_management.description: Junction table linking OKRs to management entities, enabling tracking of management involvement and ownership of OKRs.

okr_management_id.description: Unique identifier for each OKR-Management relationship

okr_id.description: Foreign key to the okr table

management_id.description: Foreign key to the management table (e.g., user or team ID)

role.description: Role of the management entity in relation to the OKR (e.g., owner, contributor, reviewer)

created_date.description: Date and time when the relationship was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the relationship was last updated

sales_incentives.description: Junction table linking sales records to specific incentive programs, allowing for tracking of which incentives were applied to each sale.

sales_incentive_id.description: Unique identifier for each sales incentive record.

sale_id.description: Foreign key referencing the sales table.  Indicates the sale to which the incentive applies.

incentive_id.description: Foreign key referencing the incentives table. Indicates the specific incentive program applied to the sale.

incentive_amount.description: The amount of the incentive applied to the sale.  This could be a fixed amount or calculated based on the incentive type.

notes.description: Any notes or details regarding the application of the incentive to the sale.

created_date.description: Date and time when the sales incentive record was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the sales incentive record was last updated.

training_modules.description: Junction table linking training programs and modules, defining which modules are included in each training program.

training_module_id.description: Unique identifier for each training module association.

training_id.description: Foreign key referencing the training table.

module_id.description: Foreign key referencing the modules table.

module_order.description: Order in which the module appears within the training.

created_date.description: Date and time when the training module association was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the training module association was last updated.

elearning_courses.description: Junction table linking elearning modules and courses, establishing a many-to-many relationship.

elearning_course_id.description: Unique identifier for each elearning-course relationship

elearning_id.description: Foreign key referencing the elearning table

course_id.description: Foreign key referencing the courses table

created_date.description: Date and time when the relationship was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the relationship was last updated

competency_assessments.description: Junction table linking competencies and assessments, enabling many-to-many relationship between them. Records the association and any relevant assessment results.

competency_assessment_id.description: Unique identifier for each competency assessment record.

competency_id.description: Foreign key referencing the competency table.

assessment_id.description: Foreign key referencing the assessments table.

score.description: The score achieved in the assessment for the specific competency.

notes.description: Any notes or comments related to the assessment of the competency.

created_date.description: Date and time when the competency assessment record was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the competency assessment record was last updated.

contact_social_links.description: Stores social media links associated with contacts.

contact_social_link_id.description: Unique identifier for each contact social link entry.

contact_id.description: Foreign key to the contacts table.

social_media_profile_id.description: Foreign key to the social_media_profiles table.

profile_url.description: URL of the contact's social media profile.

username.description: Username of the contact on the social media platform.

created_date.description: Date and time when the social link was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the social link was last updated.

user_login_logs.description: Stores login history for users, tracking login attempts, success/failure, timestamps, and related information.

login_log_id.description: Unique identifier for each login log entry

user_id.description: Foreign key to the users table, identifying the user who attempted to log in

logout_time.description: Timestamp of the logout event. Can be NULL if the user is still logged in.

ip_address.description: IP address from which the login attempt originated

user_agent.description: User agent string of the browser or application used for the login attempt

login_successful.description: Boolean indicating whether the login attempt was successful (1) or failed (0)

failure_reason.description: If the login failed, this field may contain the reason for the failure (e.g., invalid password)

session_id.description: Session ID associated with the login session

created_date.description: Date and time when the log entry was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the log entry was last updated

customer_lifetime_value.description: Stores the calculated Customer Lifetime Value (CLTV) for each customer, along with related data for analysis and segmentation.

cltv_id.description: Unique identifier for each CLTV record.

customer_id.description: Foreign key to the customers table, identifying the customer for whom the CLTV is calculated.

predicted_revenue.description: Predicted future revenue from the customer.

segment_id.description: Foreign key to the customer_segments table, indicating the customer segment.

calculation_date.description: Date when the CLTV was calculated.

model_version.description: Version of the CLTV calculation model used.

created_date.description: Date and time when the CLTV record was created.

updated_date.description: Date and time when the CLTV record was last updated.

social_media_profiles.description: Stores information about social media profiles, including platform and profile URL.

social_media_profile_id.description: Unique identifier for each social media profile

platform.description: Name of the social media platform (e.g., Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn)

profile_url.description: URL of the social media profile

created_date.description: Date and time when the social media profile was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the social media profile was last updated

crm_usage_metrics.description: Tracks usage metrics within the CRM system, providing insights into user activity and system performance. This table helps monitor feature adoption, identify areas for improvement, and optimize resource allocation.

metric_id.description: Unique identifier for each usage metric record.

user_id.description: Foreign key to the users table, representing the user who performed the action.

team_id.description: Foreign key to the teams table, representing the team to which the user belongs.

metric_value.description: Numeric value associated with the metric (e.g., number of records created, time spent in the system).

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the metric was recorded.

description.description: Optional description or details about the metric event.

created_date.description: Date and time when the metric was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the metric was last updated

third_party_integrations.description: Stores information about third-party integrations configured for the CRM system. This table holds configuration details and status information for each integration.

integration_id.description: Unique identifier for each third-party integration

integration_name.description: Name of the third-party integration (e.g., Mailchimp, Slack)

integration_type.description: Type of integration (e.g., email marketing, communication)

api_key.description: API key for accessing the third-party service

api_secret.description: API secret for accessing the third-party service

status.description: Status of the integration (e.g., active, inactive, pending)

last_sync_date.description: Date and time of the last successful synchronization

sync_frequency.description: How often the integration should synchronize data (e.g., daily, weekly)

created_date.description: Date and time when the integration was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the integration was last updated

multi_factor_auth.description: Stores multi-factor authentication information for users, including the user ID, authentication type, secret key, and verification status.

mfa_id.description: Unique identifier for each multi-factor authentication record

user_id.description: Foreign key to the users table, identifying the user associated with this MFA record

secret_key.description: Secret key used for generating authentication codes (e.g., for TOTP)

phone_number.description: Phone number used for SMS-based authentication (if applicable)

email.description: Email address used for email-based authentication (if applicable)

is_verified.description: Indicates whether the MFA method has been verified by the user

created_date.description: Date and time when the MFA record was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the MFA record was last updated

user_behavior_logs.description: Stores logs of user activities within the CRM system, providing insights into user behavior and system usage.

log_id.description: Unique identifier for each user behavior log entry

user_id.description: Foreign key referencing the users table, indicating the user who performed the action

activity_details.description: Detailed information about the activity, stored as JSON.  Can include IDs of affected records, changes made, etc.

ip_address.description: IP address of the user when performing the activity

user_agent.description: User agent string of the user's browser

session_id.description: Session ID associated with the user's activity

log_time.description: Timestamp of when the activity occurred

created_date.description: Date and time when the log entry was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the log entry was last updated

team_productivity_metrics.description: Stores productivity metrics for teams within the CRM system, providing insights into team performance and efficiency.

metric_id.description: Unique identifier for each productivity metric record

team_id.description: Foreign key referencing the team_collaboration table, indicating the team associated with the metrics.

date.description: The date for which the productivity metrics are recorded.

emails_sent.description: Number of emails sent by the team on the given date.

calls_made.description: Number of calls made by the team on the given date.

meetings_held.description: Number of meetings held by the team on the given date.

deals_closed.description: Number of deals closed by the team on the given date.

revenue_generated.description: Total revenue generated by the team on the given date.

crm_usage_id.description: Foreign key referencing the crm_usage_metrics table, linking to overall CRM usage metrics.

created_date.description: Date and time when the metric record was created

updated_date.description: Date and time when the metric record was last updated
